narrative.asA: verify the Provider Indicator tab for enrolled providers
narrative.iWantTo: I can ensure indicators are updated and displayed correctly

scenario.title: Provider Indicator Verification for Enrolled Providers
scenario.step: Given user navigated to landing page
When new user logs to Internal User portal with username - internal.user.dyp+cd@gmail.com and password - Internaluser1!
When click on 'Agree' button in the Portal page
When user calls Provider Indicator API
When user clicks on Providers tab
